title: enru pirandavaL
sahitya:
enru pirandavaL enruNarAda iyalbiNalAm engaL tAi engaL tAi


anupallavi

  yArum vaghuttark-kariya pirAyattaL AyinumE engaL tAi engaL tAi


caraNam    nallaram nADiya mannarai vAzhtti nalam purivAL engaL tAi avar
allavarAyin avarai vizhungi Anandak-kUttiDuvAL engaL tAi
